mapper.update:
update content
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
love_id = #{loveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment_id = #{commentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content_id = #{contentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update content set content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, love_id = #{loveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_id = #{commentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content_id = #{contentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT id, content, type, create_time, update_time, deleted, love_id, comment_id, content_id FROM content WHERE content_id=#{contentId}
